question_content.description:
### Problem22

The Toy-8 has 7 modules, which are ALU, processor register (R), _____(0)\___ register, program counter (PC), memory, fetch-execute _____(1)\___, and Control circuit. The bus connections consist of _____(2)\___ wires in TOY-8.

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
